+         function downloadAsPNG() {
+             const element = document.getElementById('screenshot-area');
+             const button = document.querySelector('.download-btn');
+             
+             // ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’ä¸€æ™‚çš„ã«éè¡¨ç¤º
+             button.style.display = 'none';
+             
+             html2canvas(element, {
+                 backgroundColor: '#F8F9FA',
+                 scale: 2, // é«˜è§£åƒåº¦
+                 useCORS: true,
+                 allowTaint: true
+             }).then(canvas => {
+                 // ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’å†è¡¨ç¤º
+                 button.style.display = 'block';
+                 
+                 // PNGç”»åƒã¨ã—ã¦ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰
+                 const link = document.createElement('a');
+                 link.download = 'sony_bank_forex_guide.png';
+                 link.href = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
+                 link.click();
+             }).catch(error => {
+                 console.error('ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆã®ç”Ÿæˆã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ:', error);
+                 button.style.display = 'block';
+                 alert('ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆã®ç”Ÿæˆã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ã‚‚ã†ä¸€åº¦ãŠè©¦ã—ãã ã•ã„ã€‚');
+             });
+         }
+     </script>
